ygData.subject: Re: ????? & new problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you for the info, but the problems this time may be with the server.I saw a desperate posting on nother board about Mithasniel Marr last night. After I
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you for the info, but the problems this
time may be with the server.I saw a desperate posting
on nother board about Mithasniel Marr last night.
After I sitched servers (and made up still another
character on Veeshan), I did not have the problems. <br>
Did I read last night tha you will need at least
256Megs to run Luclin and 512 to run it properly? Wow.Wht
a boom for the memory addicts to sell all of that
memory to EQ addicts,lol. On the other habd, it is about
time someone was brave enough to do this.<br> I am too
well into UO to ever give it up. There are things I
prefer in both games.At this time, of course, I am much
more comfortable with UO, but I am trying to learn EQ.
I bought the strategy guide (the big one)and am
trying to read in that as well as the book that came
with my game.In fact I read myself to sleep last
night.
